title._content: At the White House this morning Laddie bo[y] was the recipient of a huge birthday cake with three candles, each tipped with a tiny American flag  (LOC)

description._content: At the White House this morning Laddie bo[y] was the recipient of a huge birthday cake with three candles, each tipped with a tiny American flag 1922 July 25. 1 photographic print. Notes: In album: Washington, D.C., 1 July 1922 to Aug. 1922, v. 7, Herbert E. French, National Photo Company, p. 25, no. 19315. Forms part of: National Photo Company Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Harding, Warren G.--(Warren Gamaliel),--1865-1923--Animals & pets. Pets--1920-1930. Dogs--1920-1930. Birthday parties--Washington (D.C.)--1920-1930. Format: Photographic prints--1920-1930. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print More information about the National Photo Company Collection is available at www.loc.gov/pictures/collection/npco/ Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3c31899 Call Number: LOT 12294, v. 7 [item]
